title: Reverb
sinopse:
A collection of six short stories, each with it’s own supernatural girl.

1st Memory: Shijima - A fortune-teller who exists by sealing other people's memories and living it as her own.

2nd Memory: Dismounting Midway

3rd Memory: The Passing...

4th Memory: Falling Sakura in Profusion

5th Memory: Beside the Water

6th Memory: Time's Aftertaste

-   from Aerandria Scans
